about.title: About your osteopath
about.description1: Camille is an accredited and exclusive osteopath. She studied 5 years full time in France, within an education that meets the european standards of osteopathy.
about.description2: She is also formed in osteopathic tissular approach of Pierre Tricot, in aquatic, obstetric osteopathy of Elisabeth Tissot, pediatric, psycho-somatic osteopathy, in integrative gynecology and is also trauma-informed.
